column5: NF but great marketing. Air Canada should learn something about customer service/recognition   Merry Christmas
wow that's wicked! they got the same tv I have haha it was like $700
wow. Does westjet fly out of North Bay? haha.
What a GREAT gift they did at WestJet!
Now THAT is what CHRISTMAS is all about!!  I've always liked travelling with west jet. That just sealed the deal!  S

Between here and that face book site I have seen this a few times now today.  I watch it every time as it's such an amazing thing they did.  I have flown with them and if I get to pick between providers for my next flight(s) then it WILL be with them again!
The guy who asked for a warm scarf has got to be kicking himself in the teeth

I have quite a bit of respect for the dude who asked for socks and gitch.  He figured he was talking to a novelty Santa, had no expectation of ever gettig anything out of it.  He could've asked for a giraffe with a saddle, instead he said hey I need some socks and undies.  Fair enough!
Great Video,  thanks for posting. Did you know that West Jet donates free flights for the Make-A-Wish charity.
That was freakin awesome! So is there a corporation out there that has a heart and is willing to share with it's customers. West Jet has a new fan today!  Thanks for posting that! HH
Not one of those people will ever fly with another airline again.  What a way to generate customer loyalty.  Awesome.
So different from most. Thanks for putting it up.
